item0.title: Kansas up, Michigan down in Way-Too-Early Top 25 for 2019-20
item0.description: NBA draft decisions and some critical prospect commitments have altered our emerging snapshot of the 2019-20 college hoops season.

item1.title: College basketball transfer rankings for 2019-20 and 2020-21
item1.description: It's college basketball's version of free agency. We've ranked the top players who are set to switch schools this offseason.

item2.title: Lacrosse star Spencer to play hoops at N'western
item2.description: Loyola Maryland star Patrick Spencer, who won the Tewaaraton Award as the nation's best lacrosse player, is switching schools -- and sports -- for his final year of college.

item3.title: Calipari can shift to advisory role under new deal
item3.description: Based on the new 10-year, $86 million contract extension he just signed, men's basketball coach John Calipari intends to retire at Kentucky -- one way or another.

item4.title: College basketball's winners and losers of the NBA draft deadline
item4.description: Wednesday was the deadline for player entry in the 2019 NBA draft. Here are the college teams with bigger (or fewer) worries.
